RobotController - class edu.wsu.KepheraSimulator.RobotController.
A RobotController is an abstract class that should be extended by any controller written for the WSU Kephera Simulator.
RobotController() - Constructor for class edu.wsu.KepheraSimulator.RobotController
Allocates a new RobotController object.
RobotControllerDirector - class edu.wsu.KepheraSimulator.RobotControllerDirector.
A RobotControllerDirector is a utility class used to load, manage, and unload controllers that extend RobotController.
RobotControllerDirector(CurrentRobotState) - Constructor for class edu.wsu.KepheraSimulator.RobotControllerDirector
Initialize and create a new RobotControllerDirector.
RobotCoordinates - class edu.wsu.KepheraSimulator.RobotCoordinates.
The RobotCoordinates class represents the current coordinates and direction of the robot.
RobotCoordinates() - Constructor for class edu.wsu.KepheraSimulator.RobotCoordinates
Allocate a new RobotCoordinates object and initialize it with default values.
RobotCoordinates(int, int, float, float, float) - Constructor for class edu.wsu.KepheraSimulator.RobotCoordinates
Allocate a new RobotCoordinates object and initialize it with default values.
RobotStatePanel - class edu.wsu.KepheraSimulator.RobotStatePanel.
The RobotStatePanel is a GUI component that shows the current status of the robot gripper, arm, and the object presence sensor.
RobotStatePanel(String) - Constructor for class edu.wsu.KepheraSimulator.RobotStatePanel
Allocate a new RobotStatePanel that shows the status of the specified type.
rotateObject() - Method in class edu.wsu.KepheraSimulator.ObjectPanel
Rotate the selected object.
rotateRobot() - Method in class edu.wsu.KepheraSimulator.WorldPanel
